id: Jeff's Weekly Agenda Template for Notion (2022)
name: Jeff's Weekly Agenda Template for Notion (2022)
description: One area Notion truly shines is its ability to help your organize your life. And what better place to start than your week? In this weekly Notion planner, you can see I’ve boiled all the planning and organizing down to the basics to minimize friction and ensure you’re able to consistently stick with this day-to-day, week-by-weekWhether you’re working professional or student, it’s extremely easy to get started with this Notion weekly agenda template. My recommendation is to sit down for 5 minutes
